programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms Of China
programme.desc: Follow a fiercely determined snow leopard mother as she teaches her cub vital life lessons; watch a family of Tibetan fox face a formidable feline hunter to protect their precious young; and admire the stealth and agility of the one of the world's smallest cats.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms Of China

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol‚Äôs need to break ground for a new outbuilding that will house incoming livestock and Charles has dreamt up an outrageous idea of what that structure can be ‚Äì and it just may be just crazy enough to work. At the auction, the Pol‚Äôs are hoping to purchase sheep and cows, but the skyrocketing bids threaten their big plans.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The bidding is live at the large animal auction! The Pol‚Äôs are working towards their goal of bringing home sheep and cows to their farm. Any animals they win will be delivered to the farm in just three days, so the pressure is on to get the sheep hut finished in time ‚Äì and there is a ton left to do. Meanwhile, Beth and Charles are concerned about the low activity in their beehives.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs. Cheetah
programme.desc: Big Cat Wars will showcase an incredibly unique stock footage sequence of a moment when a predator on predator conflict turns deadly. The clip of lion vs cheetah is a nail biting moment that will shock, but in the end will shed new light on the mysterious relationship between these extraordinary big cats and their life-and-death struggle for survival.

programme.title: Jaguar Beach
programme.desc: On a remote stretch of Central America‚Äôs Pacific coast, the lush, volcanic landscape gives way to a startlingly different world: a dry tropical forest. Here, two creatures ‚Äî the sea turtle and the jaguar ‚Äî meet with spectacular consequences for both their species and the very different environments they inhabit, and an unwitting alliance turns the predator into the protector.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Katavi - Africa's Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi National Park spans over 3,000 square miles of western Tanzania. Lions, hippos and crocodiles live in harmony, until an unusual climatic cycle turns the normal dry season into an extreme drought. Lion cubs face mortal danger from a rogue male lion intent on a takeover, hippos fight viciously for dwindling river territory, and even the crocodiles struggle to survive until the rains arrive.

programme.title: Katavi - Africa's Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi is in the grips of extraordinary drought. A new litter of lion cubs is born into tough conditions, vulnerable to the attack of a rogue male, intent on taking over the pride. Water levels drop by the day, pushing two hippos to overthrow an alpha bull. Distant storms bring not rain but fire sparked by lightning. In the crushing heat, life desperately struggles to hold out for rain.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx. But for the female lynxes of the valley, it is always a challenge to raise their cubs. The series follows the lynxes in their struggle for survival, from the thrill of the hunt to the tender moments of parenting, and also witnesses their coexistence with other animals like majestic golden eagles or powerful deer.

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: We've seen big cats past and their present, but until now we could never even imagine their future! With cutting edge visual effects, Future Cats explores far-off future challenges that may await the big cats. Leading experts discuss possible extreme planetary scenarios and the adaptations big cats would to need to make in order to survive.

programme.title: A Leopard's Legacy
programme.desc: A confident and powerful leopardess named Olimba, rules over an exceptionally large area along Zambia‚Äôs Luangwa river. She is a formidable hunter, a courageous ruler, and a devoted mother. She‚Äôs just given birth to two tiny cubs, and as she faces the challenging task of motherhood, it‚Äôs a constant battle to hunt successfully, to defend her prime territory, and to protect her cubs against her enemies.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble! From brawling birds to hurting hooves, the vets swing into action mending paws, jaws, even a down on his luck duck. The Pols welcome their newest fur baby, Christy, a rambunctious Bengal kitten.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Limps, lumps and camel thumps! From domesticated to the exotics, Dr. Pol and his team witness a gamut of injuries in the harsh winter weather. Emotions run high when Dr. Nicole treats her own beloved beagle. Dr. Pol finds something‚Äôs a foot with a rowdy camel and it‚Äôs all hands-on-deck for an emergency labor resulting in litter of 11 puppies.

programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Wild Kind
programme.desc: The great outdoors: fresh air, beautiful forests and incredible wildlife. But if you go down to the woods today, be prepared for every kind of surprise. From bears crashing picnics to cougars chasing trail runners, the animals that call this place home can be wild! Take a hike into the wilderness to discover how to avoid a run-in with a bison and when to duck if you see a deer.

programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Wild Kind
programme.desc: Soon two-thirds of the global population will be living in cities, leaving wild animals to develop a whole new set of street smarts.
